result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Tou Ger Chang

records.addlTxt: Scheduling conference on December 14, 2022 at 11:10 am.

8:57 AM Defendant Tou Ger Chang appeared by video.  Attorney Anthony A. Lambrecht appeared by video for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Luke K Harrison appeared by video for Tou Ger Chang.  Inducement made.  Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 1 for trial. 
ARRAIGNMENT - 
Information has been filed.  Copy served on defense counsel.
Not guilty plea(s) entered.  Jury calendar.
Offer deadline:  September 9, 2022.
Scheduling conference scheduled for October 26, 2022 at 10:40 am.
Scheduling conference on October 26, 2022 at 10:40 am.

Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.   Preliminary hearing is set for 08-04-22 at 9:00 a.m.   
Minutes.
Initial appearance on July 18, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: RE: Possess methamphetamine as repeater, on 06-27-22.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crimes of possess methamphetamine and possess drug paraphernalia.  The matters are continued for initial appearance on 07-18-22 at 1:30 p.m. Br.1.  Bail is set at $2,000.00 recognizance bond with the condition that he maintain absolute sobriety.  Bail furnished and defendant is remanded into custody on PO hold. 
Minutes.
